title: [1.8]【冒险|解密|跑酷】It's All A Lie | 这全都是谎言
author: scorpio975
txt_content:
本帖最后由 scorpio975 于 2015-7-31 12:51 编辑 




大家好，我是scorpio975
这是我的第8次搬运，希望大家能支持一下

It's All A Lie

                                               ————_zeph (minecraftforum)

[yellow_wool]地图简介|Introduction[yellow_wool] 
It's All A Lie是一张很小的冒险/跑酷/解密的1.8地图.
这张地图的主要目标就是完成所有测试并回到家里，但是你从未知道后面会发生什么. ;)
这张地图可以很简单地在20分钟内通关或者更少，并使它成为一个完美的YouTube视频.
它有一些粗口但多数是删掉的.
我希望你可以在评论中反馈.
如果多数人认为这张地图很好，你将会在不久看到 It's All A Lie 2. :D
如果你发现了一些bugs，你也可以向我反馈.
如果游戏性会受到破坏，我确定会更新地图.

这张地图只能单人游玩，多人合作会遇到问题.

你是否想做一个视频呢？
我允许人们可以将我的地图做视频，只需要把你做好的视频放在评论内，我将会看到你做的视频. ;) 
同样在视频介绍中不要忘记放上本帖链接.

[lime_wool]关于授权|Authorization[lime_wool] 





[lightgrey_wool]作者原文|Original Text[lightgrey_wool] 

It's All A Lie
(http://bit.ly/1R7V4kj)

"It's All A Lie" is a small adventure / parkour / puzzle map made for Minecraft 1.8+. The main objective of the map is to complete all the tests and get back home but you can never know what could happen next.  ;) The map can be easily completed in 20 minutes or less making it a perfect map for a YouTube video. It has a bit of swearing but most of it is censored. I'd love if you could post feedback in the comments. If it's mostly good then you'll see "It's All A Lie 2" soon.  :D If you find any bugs then post them too. If there's a game breaking one then I'll make sure to update the map.

THIS MAP IS MEANT FOR SINGLEPLAYER. YOU WILL HAVE TROUBLE TRYING TO PLAY IT CO-OP.

HOW TO DOWNLOAD AND INSTALL
To download the map just press the link below the title. You will be redirected to MediaFire. When you're there press the big green button "DOWNLOAD" and the download should begin. The file comes in a .zip format. Download it and put the folder that's in the .zip file in your minecraft/saves folder.

ARE YOU PLANNING ON MAKING A VIDEO?
I'm allowing people to make videos on my map, just please post the link to the video in the posts description so that I can showcase the videos later.  ;) Also don't forget to add a link to this post in the videos description.

Here are some videos that others have made:
(Warning! Spoilers.)




END


这张地图真的很意想不到，各种意想不到的通关方式
如果喜欢，多多评分哦
